scenario: The global telecom analytics market size is estimated to reach USD 16.21 billion by 2030, expanding at a CAGR of 14.9% from 2025 to 2030. The cloud segment dominated the market with the largest revenue share in 2024, and is expected to witness significant growth due to low investment cost, scalability, and agility offered by cloud deployment model. The solution segment accounted for over 70.9% of the global market share in 2024 and is expected to continue its dominance as the fastest growing segment during the forecast period. The Asia-Pacific telecom analytics market is expected to grow at the highest CAGR from 2025 to 2030, accredited to the increasing investments in advanced technologies such as IoT and Big Data in the developing countries including India and China. Key players in the market include Adobe Inc., Alteryx, Cisco Systems, Inc., SAP SE, Hewlett Packard Enterprise Development L.P., Huawei Technologies Co. Ltd., IBM, Microsoft, MicroStrategy Incorporated, and Oracle. The report provides comprehensive market analysis, competitive landscape, and future trends, and is expected to be a valuable resource for investors and businesses looking to understand the telecom analytics market.
